conbody.p: Design Studio contains all the icons available in the standard packaging of Triple'A Plus. You can use any of those icons (see section ) when designing pages. Those icons are referenced in the list of available icons: see section .
conbody.section:
Sprite icon
A sprite file is a file containing plenty of icons. The following image shows an example:
A sprite icon is a reference to an icon in this file.
Regular icon A regular icon is a stand-alone gif or png file.
